Small Food Freeze Dryer

Small Food Freeze Dryer

SJ-05H 5-7kg; SJ-08H 12kg; SJ-10H Smart 10-15kg; SJ-13H 20kg; SJ-15H 22kg; SJ-20H 30kg

Developed specifically for the freeze-drying of small food items has multiple commonly used freeze-drying processes built in, and it is easy to use.
